parameters.name: "SansText"
parameter-n: "so, uh, your browser" & newline & "doesn't seem to support" & newline & "webGL."

parameters.name: "SansText"
parameter-n: "i had to make my speech" & newline & "bubble inverted just so" & newline & "you can see what i'm" & newline & "saying."

parameters.name: "SansText"
parameter-n: "most importantly, my blue" & newline & "attacks will look like" & newline & "normal attacks."

parameters.value: "* You felt your sins crawling" & newline & "  on your back."
"* You felt your sins weighing" & newline & "  on your neck."
"* KARMA coursing through your" & newline & "  veins."
"* You feel like you're going to" & newline & "  have a bad time."
"* Reading this doesn't seem" & newline & "  like the best use of time."
"* Sans is starting to look" & newline & "  really tired."
"* Sans is getting ready to" & newline & "  use his special attack."
"* SANS 1 ATK 1 DEF" & newline & "* The easiest enemy." & newline & "* Can only deal 1 damage."
"* Can't keep dodging forever." & newline & "* Keep attacking."
"* You eat the " & ItemDB.At(ItemID, 2) & "." &  newline & "* You recovered " & ItemDB.At(ItemID, 1) & " HP!"
